description: Primes p such that 47 is not a square mod p.
comments: Also, only entries p=1 (mod 4) of the sequence are not squares mod 47 (from the quadratic reciprocity law). - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jul 21 2004
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset changed from 0 to 1 by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 09 2012
